dict.string: CoreBreach is THE brand-new futuristic "anti-gravity" racing game with combat-based gameplay.

All rights reserved.
Legal Credits: This software uses libraries from the FFmpeg project under the LGPLv2.1. http://corebreach.corecode.at/FFMPEG.zip
Additional Credits: * Spanish translation, sounds and sound effects, music and highly useful beta-feedback kindly provided by "Alejandro 'Klez' González" * Gameplay testing and tuning by "Anna Wirnsberger" * Some sound effects from "Free-Loops.com" and "freeSFX.co.uk" * Font "N-Gage" from "Alejandro Conde López" * Some shader-code from NVIDIA, Apple, "Agnius Vasiliauskas" and DelphiGL * DDS loader code from Jon Watte * Frameworks "GNUstep", "SDL", "SDL_mixer", "bullet", "snappy", "libtomcrypt", "OpenAL Soft", "FreeALUT", "cml", "freetype" and "freetype-gl" from their respective teams. Read CoreBreach.app/Resources/copyright/*.txt for detailed license information.
Music Credits: * Alex Beroza - Straight To The Light * Abstract Audio - L.T.H. (AA's Refix) * Benjamin Orth - Bustin Out * djguido - The Pharmacy in my head * dr_gore2000 - The Right Time * IceSun - Cool_Boy [IceSun Rmx] * Klez - I Need you to Escape * Klez - Imperfect World * snowflake - the New Music Mantra * vantage600 - F*KING BOUNCE
